name.description: Icon name, see example icon set, if the name has a /, it will be considered an image icon
name.description_zh: 图标名称，见示例图标集，如名称带有/，会被认为是图片图标

size.description: Icon font size, the unit is px by default
size.description_zh: 图标字体大小，单位默认px

bold.description: Whether or not to display bold

index.description: A value that distinguishes between multiple icons, which is passed out via the click event when the icon is clicked
index.description_zh: 一个用于区分多个图标的值，点击图标时通过click事件传出

hoverClass.description: 图标按下去的样式类，用法同uni的view组件的hover-class参数，详见：hover-class  (opens new window)
hoverClass.description_zh: 图标按下去的样式类，用法同uni的view组件的hover-class参数，详见：hover-class  (opens new window)

customPrefix（暂不可用）.description: This value is required when customizing the font icon library, see: Extending the Custom Icon Library
customPrefix（暂不可用）.description_zh: 自定义字体图标库时，需要写上此值，详见：扩展自定义图标库  (opens new window)

label.description: Label text to the right/below the icon

labelPos.description: The position of the label relative to the icon

labelSize.description: label font size, the unit is px by default

space.description: The distance between the label and the icon, in px by default
space.description_zh: label与图标的距离，单位默认px

imgMode.description: 图片裁剪、缩放的模式，image组件原生属性，详见：image  (opens new window)
imgMode.description_zh: 图片裁剪、缩放的模式，image组件原生属性，详见：image  (opens new window)

width.description: name is the width of the image in the image path, and the unit is px by default
width.description_zh: name为图片路径时图片的宽度，单位默认px

height.description: name is the height of the image in the image path, and the unit is px by default
height.description_zh: name为图片路径时图片的高度，单位默认px

top.description: The distance from the icon to the top, if in some scenes, if the icon is not vertically centered, you can adjust this parameter, the unit is px by default
top.description_zh: 图标到顶部的距离，如果某些场景，如果图标没有垂直居中，可以调整此参数，单位默认px

stop.description: Whether or not to prevent the event from spreading

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the icon is clicked
